Symbol.Script_3D:
! ============================================================================== ! Disabled ! ============================================================================== newunID = 9000
pen gs_cont_pen if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEV_3D_OFF then end
if not(gs_shadow) then SHADOW OFF
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEV_3D_DRAFT then gs_resol = 8 gs_resol_con = 3 endif resol gs_resol pen gs_cont_pen
! ------ origo: corner add dAxisFromWall, 0, 0 hotspot 0, 0, 0, unID: unID = unID + 1
add 0, -distanceFromWall, 0
!axis from wall hsp edit hotspot -dAxisFromWall, 0, 0, newunID, dAxisFromWall, 1+256: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot -dAxisFromWall - 1, 0, 0, newunID, dAxisFromWall, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, dAxisFromWall, 2+128: newunID = newunID + 1
! ------ Toilet paper dispenser wall-mounted
if bCorner & bToiletPaper then
addy distanceFromWall
!bottom center hsps edit add 0, 0, tpd_distFromFloor hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, tpd_distFromWall, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 1, 0, newunID, tpd_distFromWall, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, -tpd_distFromWall, 0, newunID, tpd_distFromWall, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 del 1
add 0, -tpd_distFromWall, 0 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, tpd_distFromFloor, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -1, newunID, tpd_distFromFloor, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, tpd_distFromFloor, newunID, tpd_distFromFloor, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 del 1
add 0, -tpd_distFromWall + tpd_halfwidth, tpd_distFromFloor rotz -90
mulx 0.44/0.7
addz 0.08 addy -0.08633
rotz 90 rotx 90 addz 0.01
MATERIAL matPaper RESOL 2*gs_resol PRISM_ 7, 0.18, 0.07, 0.0, 79, 0.0, 0.0, 979, 0.0, 180.0, 4079, -0.07, 0.0, 79, 0.0, 0.0, 979, 0.0, 180.0, 4079, 0.07, 0.0, -1
del 1 material matDispenser
PRISM_ 5, 0.2, 0.08433, 0.08, 15, 0.08633, 0.08, 15, 0.08633, -0.08, 15, 0.08433, -0.08, 15, 0.08433, 0.08, -1
RESOL 2.5*gs_resol PRISM_ 12, 0.2, 0.08433, 0.01, 15, 0.076348, 0.01, 79, -0.0, 0.0, 900, 0.0, 202.5379, 4001, -0.066684, -0.0385, 15, -0.064952, -0.0375, 79, 0.0, -0.0, 900, 0.0, -202.3377, 4001, 0.07433, 0.01, 15, 0.07433, -0.01, 15, 0.08433, -0.01, 15, 0.08433, 0.01, -1
addz 0.005 RESOL gs_resol PRISM_ 7, 0.005, 0.022913, -0.01, 15, 0.08433, -0.01, 15, 0.08433, 0.01, 15, 0.022913, 0.01, 79, -0.0, -0.0, 900, 0.0, 312.8436, 4001, 0.022913, -0.01, -1 addz 0.185 PRISM_ 7, 0.005, 0.022913, -0.01, 15, 0.08433, -0.01, 15, 0.08433, 0.01, 15, 0.022913, 0.01, 79, -0.0, -0.0, 900, 0.0, 312.8436, 4001, 0.022913, -0.01, -1
del 10 endif
del 1
! ------ Grabs
if iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER then if vertgb then !vertical grabbar add 0, -vertgb_distFromWall, vertgb_distFromFloor
!pos hsp edit if LibraryLangCode # "USA" then hotspot 0, vertgb_distFromWall, 0, newunID, vertgb_distFromWall, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, vertgb_distFromWall + 1, 0, newunID, vertgb_distFromWall, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, vertgb_distFromWall, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 endif
!length hsps edit hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, vertgb_length, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -1, newunID, vertgb_length, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, vertgb_length, newunID, vertgb_length, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -vertgb_distFromFloor, newunID, vertgb_distFromFloor, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -vertgb_distFromFloor - 1, newunID, vertgb_distFromFloor, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, vertgb_distFromFloor, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
rotz -90 roty -90 ror = 0.05 di = grabBarDiameter aa = vertgb_length GOSUB "bar_wall" del 3 endif
if reargb then !rear grabbar addx -dAxisFromWall hotspot -reargb_length1, 0, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1
addz rearsidegb_distFromFloor
!length hsps edit hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, reargb_length1, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 1, 0, 0, newunID, reargb_length1, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot -reargb_length1, 0, 0, newunID, reargb_length1, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, reargb_length2, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot -1, 0, 0, newunID, reargb_length2, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot reargb_length2, 0, 0, newunID, reargb_length2, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
!height hsp edit hotspot 0, -0.08, -rearsidegb_distFromFloor, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, -0.08, -rearsidegb_distFromFloor - 1, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, -0.08, 0, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
add -reargb_length1, 0, 0 ror = 0.05 di = grabBarDiameter aa = reargb_length1 + reargb_length2 GOSUB "bar_wall" del 3 endif
if sgb then !side grabbar gosub "grabbar_sidewall" endif endif
addx -dAxisFromWall
if iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL then resol gs_resol if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_FLOOR then gosub "grabbar_floor"
if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_TOILET then gosub "grabbar_toilet"
if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_REARREAR then addx -grabWidth/2 gosub "grabbar_rear" addx grabWidth gosub "grabbar_rear" del 2 if bToiletPaper then addz -dBars gosub "toiletPaper" del 1 endif endif
if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDEREAR then addx -grabWidth/2 gosub "grabbar_rear" del 1 addx dAxisFromWall gosub "grabbar_sidewall" del 1 endif
if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDESIDE then addx dAxisFromWall gosub "grabbar_sidewall" mulx -1 addx dAxisFromWall + MSSide + bowlWidth / 2 gosub "grabbar_sidewall" del 3 endif endif
! ============================================================================== ! WC Bowl and Cistern ! ==============================================================================
if iFlushType = 1 then if gs_flushHandlePlace_m <> 0 and (gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEV_3D_DETAILED or gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEV_3D_SIMPLE) then !none or draft addy -distanceFromWall gosub "flushHandlePos" del 1 endif endif
if iFlushType = 1 then !cistern height hsp edit add 0, -distanceFromWall, gs_seat_height hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, cisternHeight, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -1, newunID, cisternHeight, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, cisternHeight, newunID, cisternHeight, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 del 1 endif if iFlushType = 3 then !cistern height hsp edit hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, carrierHeight, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -1, newunID, carrierHeight, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, carrierHeight, newunID, carrierHeight, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 endif
call "CompleteToiletMacro" parameters all iWCType = 1, bShowHotspots = 1, bDisabledWC = 1
del 1 ! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
!================================================================================ "bar_wall": !================================================================================
hotspot 0, 0, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1 hotspot aa, 0, 0, unID :unID = unID + 1
material matGrabBar pen gs_cont_pen
add ror, -0.08, 0 add -ror, ror, 0 rotx -90 addz 0.08-ror-0.005 RESOL 1.5*gs_resol prism_ 2, 0.005, 0, 0, 979, di/2 + 0.01, 360, 4079 del 1
RESOL gs_resol prism_ 2,.08-ror-0.005, 0, 0, 978, di/2, 360, 4078 del 2
add aa-ror,ror,0 rotx -90 RESOL 1.5*gs_resol addz 0.08-ror-0.005 prism_ 2, 0.005, 0, 0, 979, di/2 + 0.01, 360, 4079 del 1
RESOL gs_resol prism_ 2,0.08-ror-0.005, 0, 0, 978, di/2, 360, 4078 del 2
roty 90 prism_ 2,aa-2*ror, 0, 0, 974, di/2, 360, 4074
if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE = 4 | GLOB_VIEW_TYPE = 5 | GLOB_VIEW_TYPE = 7 then !section, elevation, detail flag = 4 + 8 + 16 + 32 else flag = 4 + 8 endif rotx 90 addy aa-2*ror addz -ror revolve 2,90, flag, 0, ror, 901, di/2, 360, 4001
addy -aa+2*ror rotz 180 revolve 2,90, flag, 0, ror, 901, di/2, 360, 4001
del 7 return
!================================================================================ "grabbar_sidewall": !================================================================================ add 0, -sgb_dist, rearsidegb_distFromFloor hotspot 0, -sgb_length, -rearsidegb_distFromFloor, unID :unID = unID + 1
!length hsps edit hotspot 0, sgb_dist, 0, newunID, sgb_dist, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, sgb_dist + 1, 0, newunID, sgb_dist, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, sgb_dist, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, sgb_length, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 1, 0, newunID, sgb_length, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, -sgb_length, 0, newunID, sgb_length, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
!height hsp edit hotspot 0, 0, -rearsidegb_distFromFloor, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -rearsidegb_distFromFloor - 1, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
rotz -90 ror = 0.05 di = grabBarDiameter aa = sgb_length GOSUB "bar_wall" del 2
return
!================================================================================ "grabbar_floor": !================================================================================ for hj = 1 to 2 !height hsp edit add -grabWidth/2, -grabLength, 0 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -1, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, grabHeight, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 del 1
material matGrabBar
add -grabWidth/2, 0, grabHeight rotx 90 cylind 0.005, grabRadius + 0.01 del 2
add -grabWidth/2, -0.005, grabHeight rotx 90 cylind grabLength-gripLength-0.005, grabRadius del 2
add -grabWidth/2, -grabLength + gripLength*2, 0 cylind 0.005, grabRadius + 0.01 del 1
rotx 90 cutpolya 2, 1, 0, -grabWidth/2, grabHeight, 907+64, grabRadius, 360, 4007+64 del 1
add -grabWidth/2, -grabLength + gripLength*2, 0.005 cylind grabHeight-0.005, grabRadius del 1
cutend
if hj = 1 & bToiletPaper then gosub "toiletPaper"
material matGrip add -grabWidth/2, gripLength-grabLength, grabHeight
rotz -90 if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEV_3D_DETAILED then revolve 6, 360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, 0, 1, 0, grabRadius, 1, gripRadius-grabRadius, gripRadius, 1001, gripLength-(gripRadius-grabRadius), gripRadius, 1, gripLength, grabRadius, 1001, gripLength, 0, 1 else revolve 2, 360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, gripRadius, 0, gripLength, gripRadius, 0 endif del 2 addx grabWidth next hj del 2
return
!================================================================================ "grabbar_toilet": !================================================================================ material matGrabBar for hj = 1 to 2 nc = ceil(gs_resol/2) for hi = 1 to nc alfa = hi * 90/nc put -grabWidth/2+roundoff2-roundoff2*sin(alfa), yHoldingPos, zHoldingPos+roundoff2-roundoff2*cos(alfa), -90 next hi
for hk = 1 to nc fi = 90 - atn(2/3) beta = hk * fi/nc put -grabWidth/2, yHoldingPos-roundoff2+roundoff2*cos(beta), grabHeight-roundoff2*2-roundoff2*tan(fi/2)+roundoff2*sin(beta), 0 next hk
for hm = 1 to nc gi = atn(2/3) ceta = hm * gi/nc put -grabWidth/2, yHoldingPos-roundoff2*3-roundoff2*tan(gi/2)+roundoff2*sin(ceta*(nc-hm)), grabHeight-roundoff2+roundoff2*cos(ceta*(nc-hm)), 0 next hm
if iToiletMounting = 1 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.14 if iFloorMountedBowlType = 2 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.19 if iFloorMountedBowlType = 3 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.17 if iFloorMountedBowlType = 4 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.35 if iFloorMountedBowlType = 5 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.12 if iFloorMountedBowlType = 6 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.4 else dstart = bowlWidth*0.25 if iWallHungBowlType = 2 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.32 if iWallHungBowlType = 3 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.35 if iWallHungBowlType = 4 then dstart = bowlWidth*0.4 endif
tube 2, 7+nsp/4, 1+2+16+32, 0, 0, 901, grabRadius, 360, 4001,
0, yHoldingPos, zHoldingPos, -90, -dstart, yHoldingPos, zHoldingPos, -90, -grabWidth/2+roundoff2, yHoldingPos, zHoldingPos, -90, get(nsp/3), -grabWidth/2, yHoldingPos, grabHeight-roundoff2*2-roundoff2*tan(fi/2), 0, get(nsp/2), -grabWidth/2, yHoldingPos-roundoff2*3+roundoff2*tan(gi/2), grabHeight-roundoff2+roundoff2*cos(gi), 0, get(nsp), -grabWidth/2, -grabLength+gripLength, grabHeight, 0, -grabWidth/2, -grabLength, grabHeight, 0 mulx -1 next hj del 2
if bToiletPaper then gosub "toiletPaper"
material matGrip for hj = 1 to 2
!height hsp edit add -grabWidth/2, -grabLength, 0 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -1, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, grabHeight, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
add 0, gripLength, grabHeight rotz -90 if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEV_3D_DETAILED then revolve 6, 360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, 0, 1, 0, grabRadius, 1, gripRadius-grabRadius, gripRadius, 1001, gripLength-(gripRadius-grabRadius), gripRadius, 1, gripLength, grabRadius, 1001, gripLength, 0, 1 else revolve 2, 360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, 0, gripRadius, 0, gripLength, gripRadius, 0 endif del 3 addx grabWidth next hj del 2
return
!================================================================================ "grabbar_rear": !================================================================================ material matGrabBar
add -wPlate / 2, -0.005, rearsidegb_distFromFloor - hPlate + hConsole / 2 + ePlate block wPlate, 0.005, hPlate add ePlate, 0, hPlate - ePlate rotx -90 roty 90 hotspot lConsole - hConsole/2, hConsole/2, wConsole + grabRadius prism_ 6, wConsole, 0, 0, 15, lConsole - hConsole/2, 0, 79, lConsole - hConsole/2, hConsole/2, 979, 0, 180, 4079, 0, hConsole, 15, 0, 0, -1 addz wConsole prism_ 2, 2 * grabradius, lConsole - hConsole/2, hConsole/2, 979, hConsole/2, 360, 4079 del 3 addx 2 * grabRadius + wConsole rotx -90 roty 90 prism_ 6, wConsole, 0, 0, 15, lConsole - hConsole/2, 0, 79, lConsole - hConsole/2, hConsole/2, 979, 0, 180, 4079, 0, hConsole, 15, 0, 0, -1 del 5
add 0, -grabLength + dBars/2, grabHeight
!height hsp edit hotspot 0, 0, -grabHeight, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -grabHeight-1, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 0, newunID, rearsidegb_distFromFloor, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
rotx 90 addy -dBars/2 revolve 2, 180, 0, 0, dBars/2, 901, grabRadius, 360, 4001
if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE = 4 | GLOB_VIEW_TYPE = 5 | GLOB_VIEW_TYPE = 7 then !section, elevation, detail flag = 79 else flag = 78 endif
mulz -1 addy dBars/2 prism_ 2, grabLength - dBars/2 - 0.005 - lConsole + hConsole/2, 0, 0, 900 + flag, grabRadius, 360, 4000 + flag
addy -dBars prism_ 2, grabLength - dBars/2 - 0.005, 0, 0, 900 + flag, grabRadius, 360, 4000 + flag del 6 return
!================================================================================ "flushHandlePos": !================================================================================
material flushHandleMat
delnum = 0
if gs_flushHandlePlace_m = 2 then mulx -1 delnum = delnum + 1 endif
if iToiletMounting = 1 and (iFloorMountedBowlType = 5 or iFloorMountedBowlType = 6) then if iFloorMountedBowlType = 5 then addx -(0.407*bowlWidth + 0.015/2) addy -bowlDepth/4 addz gs_seat_height + 0.100 rotz 10 delnum = delnum + 4 endif
if iFloorMountedBowlType = 6 then addx -(bowlWidth/2 + 0.015/2) addy -bowlDepth/7 addz gs_seat_height + 0.150 delnum = delnum + 3 endif
roty 90 rotz -90 delnum = delnum + 2
if iFloorMountedBowlType = 5 then rotx -15 delnum = delnum + 1 endif else addx -(cisternWidth/2 + 0.015/2) delnum = delnum + 1
if iCisternType = 1 then addx 0.015/0.435*cisternWidth if iCisternType = 2 then addx 0.006/0.271*cisternWidth if iCisternType = 3 then addx 0.063/0.374*cisternWidth if iCisternType = 4 then addx 0 if iCisternType = 5 then addx 0.004/0.400*cisternWidth delnum = delnum + 1
addy -cisternDepth/2 addz gs_seat_height + cisternHeight*0.6 delnum = delnum + 2
if iCisternType = 3 then rotz 25 delnum = delnum + 1 endif
roty 90 rotz -90 delnum = delnum + 2
if iCisternType = 1 then rotx 7 if iCisternType = 2 then rotx -7 if iCisternType = 3 then rotx 9 if iCisternType = 4 then rotx 0 if iCisternType = 5 then rotx 3 delnum = delnum + 1 endif
gosub "flushHandle"
del delnum
return
!================================================================================ "flushHandle": !================================================================================
addz -0.015/2
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DETLEV_3D_DETAILED then prism_ 20, 0.015, 0.047807, -0.02, 15+64, 0.047807, -0.01, 900, 0, -104.036243, 4015+64, 0.03810633, -0.00757464, 15+64, 0.03219223, -0.00609611, 900, 0, 104.0362, 4015+64, 0.032192235, 0, 15+64, 0, 0, 15+64, -0.006893660, -0.02757464, 15+64, 0.002807764, -0.03, 900, 0, 104.0362, 4015+64, 0.002807764, -0.04, 15+64, 0.08, -0.04, 15+64, 0.08, -0.03, 900, 0, 90, 4015+64, 0.09, -0.03, 15+64, 0.08, -0.03, 900, 0, 90, 4015+64, 0.08, -0.02, 15+64, 0.04780776, -0.02, 15+64 else prism_ 7, 0.015, -0.01, -0.04, 15, 0.09, -0.04, 15, 0.09, -0.02, 15, 0.035, -0.02, 15, 0.04, 0, 15, 0, 0, 15, -0.01, -0.04, 15 endif
del 1
return
!================================================================================ "toiletPaper": !================================================================================ rotx 90 cutpolya 2, 1, 0, -grabWidth/2, grabHeight, 907+64, grabRadius, 360, 4007+64 del 1
for hi = 1 to ceil(gs_resol/2) alfa = hi * 90/ceil(gs_resol/2) put -grabWidth/2, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1+roundoff1*cos(alfa), grabHeight-0.1+roundoff1-roundoff1*sin(alfa), 0 next hi
tube 2, 5+nsp/4, 1+2+16+32, 0, 0, 901, grabRadius, 360, 4001,
-grabWidth/2, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5, grabHeight+1, 0, -grabWidth/2, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5, grabHeight, 0, -grabWidth/2, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5, grabHeight-0.1+roundoff1, 0, get(nsp), -grabWidth/2, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-gripLength, grabHeight-0.1, 0, -grabWidth/2, -grabLength, grabHeight-0.1, 0
cutend
material matPaper resol 2*gs_resol add -grabWidth/2, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1, grabHeight-0.1225+grabRadius rotx 90 prism_ 5+2, 0.1, -0.06, -0.09, 15, -0.06, 0, 15+64, 0.06, 0, 1015+64, -0.06+0.00001, 0, 1015+64, -0.06, -0.09, -1,
0, 0, 979, 0.0225, 360, 4079 del 2
return
Symbol.Script_2D:
fill gs_fill_type pen gs_cont_pen
! =============================================================================== ! Disabled ! origo: toilet axis on wall ! ===============================================================================
! ------ corner hsp newunID = 8000 hotspot2 dAxisFromWall, 0, unID : unID = unID + 1
! --- WC Bowl and Cistern ---------------------------------------------------
call "CompleteToiletMacro" parameters all iWCType = 1, bShowHotspots = 1, bDisabledWC = 1
! ------ Scale Settings
call "2dDetailLevel" parameters gs_detlevel_2D = gs_detlevel_2D, gs_detlevel_2D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m, enable2dDetLevels = 30, returned_parameters det2D
add2 0, -distanceFromWall
!axis from wall hsp edit hotspot2 0, 0, newunID, dAxisFromWall, 1+256: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 -1, 0, newunID, dAxisFromWall, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 dAxisFromWall, 0, newunID, dAxisFromWall, 2+128: newunID = newunID + 1
if iFlushType = 2 then drawindex 30 else drawindex 50 endif
! ------ Toilet paper dispenser wall-mounted if bCorner & bToiletPaper & det2D = 3 then
!bottom center hsp edit add2 dAxisFromWall, distanceFromWall hotspot2 0, 0, newunID, tpd_distFromWall, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 0, 1, newunID, tpd_distFromWall, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 0, -tpd_distFromWall, newunID, tpd_distFromWall, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
add2 -0.163, -tpd_distFromWall POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, -tpd_halfwidth, 1, 0.163, -tpd_halfwidth, 1, 0.163, tpd_halfwidth, 1, 0, tpd_halfwidth, 1, 0, -tpd_halfwidth, -1
del 2 endif
del 1
! ------ Grabs
if iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER then if reargb then !rear grab bar
!length hsps edit hotspot2 0, 0, newunID, reargb_length1, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 1, 0, newunID, reargb_length1, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 -reargb_length1, 0, newunID, reargb_length1, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 0, 0, newunID, reargb_length2, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 -1, 0, newunID, reargb_length2, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 reargb_length2, 0, newunID, reargb_length2, 2: newunID = newunID + 1
add2 -reargb_length1, 0
ror = 0.05 di = grabBarDiameter aa = reargb_length1 + reargb_length2 bb = 0.008 tempID = unID gosub "bar_wall" unID = tempID
del 1 endif if sgb then !side grab bar
add2 dAxisFromWall, -sgb_dist
tempID = unID tempnewID = newunID gosub "grabbar_sidewall" unID = tempID newunID = tempnewID
del 1 endif if vertgb & det2D = 3 then !vertical grab bar
add2 dAxisFromWall, -vertgb_distFromWall
if LibraryLangCode # "USA" then !position hsp edit hotspot2 0, vertgb_distFromWall, newunID, vertgb_distFromWall, 1+128: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 0, vertgb_distFromWall+1, newunID, vertgb_distFromWall, 3: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 0, 0, newunID, vertgb_distFromWall, 2: newunID = newunID + 1 endif
rot2 -90 ror = 0.05 di = grabBarDiameter bb = 0.008
hotspot2 0, 0, unID: unID = unID + 1
POLY2_B 9, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -di/2-0.01, 0, 1, di/2+0.01, 0, 1, di/2+0.01, -0.005, 1, di/2, -0.005, 1, di/2, -bb-0.072, 1, -di/2, -bb-0.072, 1001, -di/2, -0.005, 1, -di/2-0.01, -0.005, 1, -di/2-0.01, 0, -1 line2 -di/2, -0.005, di/2, -0.005 del 2 endif endif
if iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL then if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_FLOOR then add2 -grabWidth/2, 0 if bToiletPaper & det2D = 3 then gosub "toiletPaper" gosub "grabbar_floor" add2 grabWidth, 0 gosub "grabbar_floor" endif
if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_TOILET then drawindex 10 add2 -grabWidth/2, 0 if bToiletPaper & det2D = 3 then gosub "toiletPaper" del 1 gosub "grabbar_toilet" mul2 -1, 1 gosub "grabbar_toilet" del 1 endif
if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_REARREAR then add2 -grabWidth/2, 0 if bToiletPaper & det2D = 3 then gosub "toiletPaper" gosub "grabbar_rear" add2 grabWidth, 0 gosub "grabbar_rear" del 2 endif
if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDEREAR then add2 -grabWidth/2, 0 gosub "grabbar_rear" add2 grabWidth/2 + dAxisFromWall, -sgb_dist
tempID = newunID tempnewID = newunID gosub "grabbar_sidewall" newunID = tempnewID
del 2 endif
if iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDESIDE then add2 dAxisFromWall, -sgb_dist
tempID = newunID tempnewID = newunID gosub "grabbar_sidewall" del 1 mul2 -1, 1 add2 MSSide + bowlWidth/2, -sgb_dist gosub "grabbar_sidewall" newunID = tempnewID
del 2 endif
endif
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== "bar_wall": ! ============================================================================== hotspot2 0, 0, tempID: tempID = tempID + 1 hotspot2 aa, 0, tempID: tempID = tempID + 1
POLY2_B 25, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -di/2-0.01, 0, 1, di/2+0.01, 0, 1, di/2+0.01, -0.005, 1, di/2, -0.005, 1, di/2, -bb+ror-0.072, 1, ror, -bb+ror-0.072, 901, 0, 90, 4001, aa-ror, -bb+di/2-0.072, 1, aa-ror, -bb+ror-0.072, 901, 0, 90, 4001, aa-di/2, -0.005, 1, aa-di/2-0.01, -0.005, 1, aa-di/2-0.01, 0, 1, aa+di/2+0.01, 0, 1, aa+di/2+0.01, -0.005, 1, aa+di/2, -0.005, 1, aa+di/2, -bb+ror-0.072, 1, aa-ror, -bb+ror-0.072, 901, 0, -90, 4001, ror, -bb-di/2-0.072, 1, ror, -bb+ror-0.072, 901, 0, -90, 4001, -di/2, -0.005, 1, -di/2-0.01, -0.005, 1, -di/2-0.01, 0, -1
line2 -di/2, -0.005, di/2, -0.005 line2 aa-di/2, -0.005, aa+di/2, -0.005 return
!================================================================================ "grabbar_sidewall": ! ! set tempID = tempnewID for continuous ID's ! otherwise bar_wall will use temp_ID ! !================================================================================ if tempID = tempnewID then bNewID = 1 else bNewID = 0
!length hsps edit hotspot2 0, sgb_dist, tempnewID, sgb_dist, 1+128: tempnewID = tempnewID + 1 hotspot2 0, sgb_dist+1, tempnewID, sgb_dist, 3: tempnewID = tempnewID + 1 hotspot2 0, 0, tempnewID, sgb_dist, 2: tempnewID = tempnewID + 1 hotspot2 0, 0, tempnewID, sgb_length, 1+128: tempnewID = tempnewID + 1 hotspot2 0, 1, tempnewID, sgb_length, 3: tempnewID = tempnewID + 1 hotspot2 0, -sgb_length, tempnewID, sgb_length, 2: tempnewID = tempnewID + 1
rot2 -90
ror = 0.05 di = grabBarDiameter aa = sgb_length bb = 0.008 if bNewID then tempID = tempnewID gosub "bar_wall" if bNewID then tempnewID = tempID
del 1
return
! ============================================================================== "grabbar_floor": ! ============================================================================== hotspot2 0, 0, unID: unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 0, -grabLength, unID: unID = unID + 1
poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -grabRadius-0.01, -0.005, 1, grabRadius+0.01, -0.005, 1, grabRadius+0.01, 0, 1, -grabRadius-0.01, 0, 1, -grabRadius-0.01, -0.005, -1
poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -grabRadius, -0.005, 1, grabRadius, -0.005, 1, grabRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, 1, -grabRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, 1, -grabRadius, -0.005, -1
poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -gripRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, 1, gripRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, 1, gripRadius, -grabLength, 1, -gripRadius, -grabLength, 1, -gripRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, -1 return
! ============================================================================== "grabbar_toilet": ! ============================================================================== poly2_b 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, yHoldingPos-grabRadius, 1, -grabWidth/2+grabRadius, yHoldingPos-grabRadius, 1, -grabWidth/2+grabRadius, yHoldingPos, 1, -grabWidth/2, yHoldingPos+grabRadius, 1001, 0, yHoldingPos+grabRadius, 0, 0, yHoldingPos-grabRadius, -1
add2 -grabWidth/2, 0 hotspot2 0, yHoldingPos, unID: unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 0, -grabLength, unID: unID = unID + 1
poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, grabRadius, yHoldingPos, 1, grabRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, 1, -grabRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, 1, -grabRadius, yHoldingPos, 1, grabRadius, yHoldingPos, 1001
poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -gripRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, 1, gripRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, 1, gripRadius, -grabLength, 1, -gripRadius, -grabLength, 1, -gripRadius, -grabLength+gripLength, -1 del 1
return
! ============================================================================== "grabbar_rear": ! ============================================================================== hotspot2 0, 0, newunID: newunID = newunID + 1 hotspot2 0, -grabLength, newunID: newunID = newunID + 1
poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -wPlate/2, -0.005, 1, wPlate/2, -0.005, 1, wPlate/2, 0, 1, -wPlate/2, 0, 1, -wPlate/2, -0.005, -1
poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -wPlate/2 + ePlate, -0.005, 1, wPlate/2 - ePlate, -0.005, 1, wPlate/2 - ePlate, -0.005 - lConsole, 1, -wPlate/2 + ePlate, -0.005 - lConsole, 1, -wPlate/2 + ePlate, -0.005, -1
poly2_b 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -grabRadius, -0.005, 1, grabRadius, -0.005, 1, grabRadius, -grabLength, 1, 0, -grabLength, 901, 0, -180, 4001, -grabRadius, -0.005, -1 return
! ============================================================================== "toiletPaper": ! ============================================================================== if iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL & iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_REARREAR then gr2 = grabRadius else gr2 = gripRadius endif poly2_b 9, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -0.06, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1-0.1, 1, -gr2, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1-0.1, 0, gr2, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1-0.1, 1, 0.06, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1-0.1, 1, 0.06, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1, 1, grabRadius, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1, 0, -grabRadius, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1, 1, -0.06, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1, 1, -0.06, -grabLength+gripLength*1.5-roundoff1-0.1, -1 return
Symbol.Script_1D:
! ============================================================================== ! Toilet ADA ! ==============================================================================
unID = 4000
EPS = 0.00001
GRAB_PARALLEL = 1 GRAB_CORNER = 2
GRAB_FLOOR = 1 GRAB_TOILET = 2 GRAB_SIDESIDE = 3 GRAB_REARREAR = 4 GRAB_SIDEREAR = 5
! --- Detail Levels ---
DETLEV_3D_DETAILED = 2 DETLEV_3D_SIMPLE = 1 DETLEV_3D_DRAFT = 3 DETLEV_3D_OFF = 0
dim st_flushPlace[3] st_flushPlace[1] = `Справа` st_flushPlace[2] = `Слева` st_flushPlace[3] = `Нет`
dim st_strGrabBars[2] st_strGrabBars[1] = `Параллельно` st_strGrabBars[2] = `Угол`
gs_showTank = 1*(iFlushType=1 or iFlushType=2) wc_h = gs_seat_height
if zzyzx<0.4 then zzyzx=0.4
grabHeight = rearsidegb_distFromFloor grabWidth = MAX(bowlWidth,cisternWidth)+0.16 grabLength = 0.89 gripLength = 0.15 grabRadius = grabBarDiameter/2 gripRadius = gripBarDiameter/2 roundoff1 = 0.04 roundoff2 = 0.08 zHoldingPos = wc_h - 0.1 yHoldingPos = -0.2
!rear grabbars console geometry dBars = 0.15 !grabbars distance above each wConsole = 0.01 !console width hConsole = 0.06 !console height lConsole = hConsole + 0.01 !console length ePlate = 0.02 !endplate oversize wPlate = 2 * (grabRadius + wConsole + ePlate) !endplate width hPlate = dBars + hConsole + 2 * ePlate !endplate height
if not(bEnableParGrabBars) then iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER else if iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL then reargb = 0 sgb = 0 vertgb = 0 endif endif
!bounds of dAxisFromWall if iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL then minaxis = 0.430 if LibraryLangCode = "USA" then maxaxis = 0.485 else maxaxis = 0.490 endif else if LibraryLangCode = "USA" then minaxis = 0.405 else minaxis = 0.400 endif if LibraryLangCode = "USA" then maxaxis = 0.455 else maxaxis = 0.450 endif endif
if iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER | \ (iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL & (iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDEREAR or iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDESIDE)) then bCorner = 1 else bCorner = 0 endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
hideparameter all "A", "B", "ZZYZX"
! ============================================================================== ! WC Bowl and Cistern ! ==============================================================================
call "CompleteToiletMacro" parameters all iWCType = 1, bShowHotspots = 1, bDisabledWC = 1
! ============================================================================== ! Disabled ! ==============================================================================
if not(gs_showtank) then lock "gs_flushHandlePlace", "flushHandleMat", "gs_tank_mat" hideparameter "gs_flushHandlePlace", "flushHandleMat", "gs_tank_mat" endif
values "gs_flushHandlePlace" st_flushPlace values "gs_flushHandlePlace_m" 0, 1, 2
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_flushHandlePlace" then if gs_flushHandlePlace = st_flushPlace[1] then gs_flushHandlePlace_m = 1 !right if gs_flushHandlePlace = st_flushPlace[2] then gs_flushHandlePlace_m = 2 !left if gs_flushHandlePlace = st_flushPlace[3] then gs_flushHandlePlace_m = 0 !none parameters gs_flushHandlePlace_m = gs_flushHandlePlace_m else if gs_flushHandlePlace_m = 1 then gs_flushHandlePlace = st_flushPlace[1] !right if gs_flushHandlePlace_m = 2 then gs_flushHandlePlace = st_flushPlace[2] !left if gs_flushHandlePlace_m = 0 then gs_flushHandlePlace = st_flushPlace[3] !none parameters gs_flushHandlePlace = gs_flushHandlePlace endif
if gs_cont_pen=0 then parameters gs_cont_pen=75 if gs_fill_pen=0 then parameters gs_fill_pen=19
if ConStatus_1 = 0 and ConStatus_2 = 0 then HIDEPARAMETER "gs_2d"
values "strGrabBars" st_strGrabBars values "iGrabBars" 1,2
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "strGrabBars" then iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL if strGrabBars = st_strGrabBars[2] then iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER parameters iGrabBars = iGrabBars else strGrabBars = st_strGrabBars[1] if iGrabBars = 2 then strGrabBars = st_strGrabBars[2] parameters strGrabBars = strGrabBars endif
values "tpd_distFromFloor" range[0.38, 1.06] if not(bToiletPaper) then lock "tpd_distFromSeat", "tpd_distFromWall", "tpd_distFromFloor" hideparameter "tpd_distFromSeat", "tpd_distFromWall", "tpd_distFromFloor" endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "tpd_distFromWall" then tpd_distFromSeat = tpd_distFromWall - distanceFromWall - bowlDepth PARAMETERS tpd_distFromSeat = tpd_distFromSeat else tpd_distFromWall = tpd_distFromSeat + distanceFromWall + bowlDepth PARAMETERS tpd_distFromWall = tpd_distFromWall endif lock "tpd_distFromSeat" hideparameter "tpd_distFromSeat"
if sgb and reargb and (sgb_dist - grabBarDiameter/2) < (0.08 + grabBarDiameter/2) then !they would collide in corner reargb_maxl2 = dAxisFromWall - (0.08 + grabBarDiameter) else reargb_maxl2 = dAxisFromWall - (grabBarDiameter/2 + 0.01) endif
values "dAxisFromWall" range [minaxis, maxaxis]
if LibraryLangCode = "USA" then values "tpd_distFromSeat" range[0.18, 0.23] values "tpd_distFromWall" range[distanceFromWall + bowlDepth + 0.18, distanceFromWall + bowlDepth + 0.23]
if iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL then values "MSSide" range [(0.89 - bowlWidth) / 2, (0.94 - bowlWidth) / 2] values "MSSide2" range [(0.89 - bowlWidth) / 2, (0.94 - bowlWidth) / 2] values "MSFront" range [1.525 - distanceFromWall - bowlDepth, ] else values "MSSide" range [ 1.525 - dAxisFromWall - bowlWidth/2, ] if iFlushType = 1 then !cistern values "MSFront" range [1.5 - distanceFromWall - bowlDepth, ] else values "MSFront" range [1.42 - distanceFromWall - bowlDepth, ] endif endif
values "reargb_length1" range [0.61, ] values "reargb_length2" range [0.305, reargb_maxl2] values "vertgb_distFromWall" 1.016 lock "vertgb_distFromWall" values "sgb_length" range [1.065, ] else values "tpd_distFromSeat" range[0.15, 0.3] values "tpd_distFromWall" range[distanceFromWall + bowlDepth + 0.15, distanceFromWall + bowlDepth + 0.3]
values "reargb_length1" range [0.2, ] values "reargb_length2" range [0.2, reargb_maxl2] if sgb then values "vertgb_distFromWall" range [distanceFromWall + bowlDepth, sgb_dist + sgb_length] else values "vertgb_distFromWall" range [distanceFromWall + bowlDepth, distanceFromWall + bowlDepth + MSFront - (grabBarDiameter/2 + 0.01)] endif values "sgb_length" range [0.1, ] endif
if bCorner then !bar on side wall MSSide2 = dAxisFromWall - bowlWidth / 2 parameters MSSide2 = MSSide2 lock "MSSide2" endif
if not(reargb) then lock "reargb_length1", "reargb_length2" hideparameter "reargb_length1", "reargb_length2" endif
values "sgb_dist" range[(grabBarDiameter/2 + 0.01), ]
if (iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER and not(sgb)) or \ (iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL and not(iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDEREAR or iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDESIDE)) then
lock "sgb_length", "sgb_dist" hideparameter "sgb_length", "sgb_dist" endif
values "vertgb_length" range [0.1, ] values "vertgb_distFromFloor" range [grabBarDiameter/2 + 0.01, ] if not(vertgb) then lock "vertgb_length", "vertgb_distFromFloor", "vertgb_distFromWall" hideparameter "vertgb_length", "vertgb_distFromFloor", "vertgb_distFromWall" endif
values "rearsidegb_distFromFloor" range[0.8382, 0.9144] if not(reargb or sgb or (iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL)) then lock "rearsidegb_distFromFloor" hideparameter "rearsidegb_distFromFloor" endif
if not(reargb or sgb or vertgb or (iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL)) then lock "matGrabBar" hideparameter "matGrabBar" endif
values "grabBarDiameter" range[0.02, 0.05] values "gripBarDiameter" range[grabBarDiameter+0.01, 0.11]
if not(bEnableParGrabBars) then parameters strGrabBars = st_strGrabBars[2] parameters iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER lock "strGrabBars","iGrabBars","iPositionGrabBars","matGrip","gripBarDiameter" hideparameter "strGrabBars","iGrabBars","iPositionGrabBars","matGrip","gripBarDiameter" else if iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL then lock "reargb", "sgb", "vertgb", "vertgb_length", "vertgb_distFromFloor" hideparameter "reargb", "sgb", "vertgb", "vertgb_length", "vertgb_distFromFloor" if not(iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDEREAR | iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_SIDESIDE) then lock "matDispenser" hideparameter "matDispenser" endif else lock "iPositionGrabBars", "matGrip","gripBarDiameter" hideparameter "iPositionGrabBars", "matGrip","gripBarDiameter" endif endif
if iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER and not(reargb or sgb or vertgb) then lock "grabBarDiameter" hideparameter "grabBarDiameter" endif
if iGrabBars = GRAB_PARALLEL and not(iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_FLOOR or iPositionGrabBars = GRAB_TOILET) then lock "gripBarDiameter" hideparameter "gripBarDiameter" endif
values "gs_resol" range [3, )
! ============================================================================= ! Onorm list Settings ! ============================================================================= if LibraryLangCode = "AUT" or LibraryLangCode = "CHE" or LibraryLangCode = "GER" then call "Onorm_Plumbing" parameters all else hideparameter "gs_onorm_Title" endif
Symbol.Comment: Унитаз для инвалидов. Редактируемый с помощью Конструктора MEP.
Symbol.Keywords: Настенный или напольный, тип бачка, тип отвода, открытое сиденье, размещение спускной ручки, дополнительная крышка, Поручень самостоятельный или прикрепленный к туалету или стене, туалетная бумага, минимальное пространство, санитария
Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
_startID = "33EAC570-A9D1-4233-92BC-FD722A62A9BE" !19 version _autoID = "5F5B900C-7624-4393-AB30-1F03C6077A41" !LIB-20 version _endID = "0D4F6DFC-D800-4E6F-AE38-CD405A325E73" !new version gosub "NewPositioningOptions_FWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! New and deleted parameters ! ============================================================================== "NewPositioningOptions_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID | actualGUID = _autoID then !new param vertgb_distFromWall is default value
dAxisFromWall = MSSide2 + bowlWidth/2
if dAxisFromWall < minaxis | dAxisFromWall > maxaxis then actualGUID = "" else
bSuccess = deleted_par_value("reargb_length", _reargb_length)
reargb_length2 = 0.305 reargb_length1 = _reargb_length - reargb_length2 parameters reargb_length1 = reargb_length1, reargb_length2 = reargb_length2
vertgb_distFromWall = 1.016
! constants defined in CompleteToiletMacro if iFlushType = 5 then ! NONEFLUSH bFlush = 0 else bFlush = 1 endif
parameters dAxisFromWall = dAxisFromWall, bFlush = bFlush, vertgb_distFromWall = vertgb_distFromWall
if iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER then bSuccess = deleted_par_value("tpd", _tpd) parameters bToiletPaper = _tpd endif
actualGUID = _endID endif endif return
Symbol.Script_BWM:
targetGUID = TO_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
gosub "NewPositioningOptions_BWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid targetGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! New and deleted parameters ! ============================================================================== "NewPositioningOptions_BWM": if targetGUID # "" then
! new parameter bFlush keeps iFlushType & strFlushType ok
newparameter "reargb_length", "Length" newparameter "tpd", "Boolean" newparameter "positionGrabBars","String"
if abs(dAxisFromWall - (bowlWidth/2 + MSSide2)) > EPS then targetGUID = "" endif
if iGrabBars = GRAB_CORNER then if (reargb & (abs(reargb_length2 - 0.305) > EPS)) |\ (vertgb & (abs(vertgb_distFromWall - 1.016) > EPS)) then
targetGUID = "" endif
reargb_length = reargb_length1 + reargb_length2 tpd = bToiletPaper
parameters reargb_length = reargb_length, tpd = tpd else if iPositionGrabBars = 2 then positionGrabBars = `На Унитазе` else if iPositionGrabBars = 1 then positionGrabBars = `Крепление к Стене` else targetGUID = "" endif endif parameters positionGrabBars = positionGrabBars endif endif return
